# Asset-Map

## Overview

| Field | Details |
|-------|---------|
| **Website** | [asset-map.com](https://www.asset-map.com/) |
| **Category** | Financial Planning / Client Visualization / Discovery Software |
| **Description** | Asset-Map is a financial mapping and visualization software designed for financial advisors to create comprehensive visual representations of client household finances. The platform transforms complex financial data into intuitive visual maps, displaying all household members, entities, assets, liabilities, cash flows, and insurance policies in a single, easy-to-understand format. Asset-Map serves as a "Software-as-Process" experience that enhances client engagement, discovery, and financial planning workflows. |

---

## Pricing Tiers

| Tier | Name | Cost | Key Features |
|------|------|------|--------------|
| **Starter** | Professional | **Contact for pricing** | Basic Asset-Map creation, single user, limited households |
| **Standard** | Team/Practice | **Contact for pricing** | Multi-user access, unlimited households, team collaboration |
| **Enterprise** | Institutional | **Custom pricing** | Full platform access, API integrations, custom reporting, dedicated support |

**Notes on Pricing:**
- **30-day money-back guarantee** - Risk-free trial with full refund option
- **No public pricing** - Contact sales for custom quotes
- **Import fees** - Professional data import available at $99 USD per hour (extreme data sets)
- **Target market:** Financial advisors, RIAs, broker-dealers
- **Discounts available** - 10% discount for Morningstar advisors (first year)
- **No long-term contracts** - Month-to-month subscription available

---

## Key Features

### Core Capabilities
- **Visual Financial Mapping** - Interactive visual maps of household finances
- **Discovery Data Collection** - Streamlined fact-finding process
- **Client Household Visualization** - Complete view of all financial elements
- **Gap Analysis** - Identify missing information and planning gaps
- **Progress Tracking** - Interactive Target-Maps for goal tracking

### Advanced Features
- **Signals Technology** - Automated indicators for financial preparedness
- **Multi-User Collaboration** - Team-based access and collaboration
- **Export Capabilities** - Generate reports and share with clients
- **Risk Assessment Tools** - Integrated risk analysis and visualization
- **Goal Setting & Tracking** - Interactive target setting and progress monitoring

### Enterprise-Only Features
- **Custom API Access** - Integration with proprietary systems
- **White-Label Options** - Platform branding for larger institutions
- **Advanced Analytics** - Custom reporting and analytics
- **Dedicated Support** - Enterprise-level customer success
- **Custom Workflows** - Tailored process automation

## Add-On Products & Services

**What it does:** Automated indicator for financial preparedness of client households

**Key Features:**

- Automated alerts for gaps and opportunities

- Proactive outreach prioritization

**Pricing:** Included in platform access

**Use Cases:**
- Advisors wanting proactive client management
- Firms seeking automated gap identification
- Practices with large client books needing prioritization

### Target-Maps
**What it does:** Interactive goal tracking and progress visualization

**Key Features:**
- Custom goal creation and tracking
- Visual progress indicators
- Client-facing interactive views
- Milestone tracking and alerts

**Pricing:** Included in platform access

**Use Cases:**
- Goal-based financial planning
- Client engagement and accountability
- Long-term relationship building

### Discovery Questionnaires
**What it does:** Structured fact-finding and data collection tools

**Key Features:**
- Standardized discovery process
- Client self-service data entry
- Automated data validation
- Integration with financial data sources

**Pricing:** Included in platform access

**Use Cases:**
- Streamlining initial client meetings
- Reducing manual data entry
- Ensuring comprehensive data collection

---

## Integration Overview

**Total Integrations:** 20+ CRM, financial planning, and data aggregation platforms

**Integration Types:**
- Native integrations (direct API connections)
- Bi-directional data sync
- Single Sign-On (SSO) capabilities
- Data import/export capabilities

**Key Integration Categories:**
- CRM Systems
- Financial Planning Software
- Data Aggregation Platforms
- Custodian Platforms
- Risk Management Tools

### Key Integrations

#### 1. Redtail CRM Integration
**Type:** Native integration (bi-directional)  
**Direction:** Bi-directional  
**What it does:** Seamlessly import clients and financial data from Redtail CRM into Asset-Map  
**Data Synced:** Client profiles, household data, financial accounts, contact information  
**Setup Complexity:** Easy (click-to-import functionality)  
**Limitations:** Requires Redtail CRM subscription  
**Documentation:** [Redtail Integration Guide](https://usersupport.asset-map.com/en/articles/5103362-redtail-integration)

#### 2. Morningstar Office Integration
**Type:** Native integration  
**Direction:** One-way (data access from Morningstar)  
**What it does:** Real-time sharing of client data and visual reports with Morningstar Office  
**Data Synced:** Investment data, market data, client portfolios  
**Setup Complexity:** Easy (configured through Morningstar)  
**Limitations:** Requires Morningstar Office subscription  
**Documentation:** [Morningstar Integration](https://www.asset-map.com/morningstaradvisorworkstation-pricing)

#### 3. Riskalyze Integration
**Type:** Third-party integration  
**Direction:** One-way (data export)  
**What it does:** Export client risk data to Riskalyze for risk assessment  
**Data Synced:** Risk tolerance scores, client risk profiles  
**Setup Complexity:** Medium (requires Riskalyze subscription)  
**Limitations:** Separate Riskalyze platform required  
**Documentation:** Available through Riskalyze

#### 4. eMoney Advisor Integration
**Type:** Third-party integration  
**Direction:** Bi-directional (inferred)  
**What it does:** Integrates with eMoney for comprehensive financial planning  
**Data Synced:** Financial planning data, account aggregation, projections  
**Setup Complexity:** Medium (requires eMoney subscription)  
**Limitations:** Requires eMoney platform  
**Documentation:** [eMoney Integrations](https://emoneyadvisor.com/integrations/)

#### 5. Custom API Integration
**Type:** REST API  
**Direction:** Bi-directional  
**What it does:** Custom integrations with proprietary systems and workflows  
**Data Synced:** Full data access based on permissions  
**Setup Complexity:** Hard (requires development resources)  
**Limitations:** Enterprise tier required  
**Documentation:** Available through enterprise sales

#### 6. Data Import Services
**Type:** Professional services  
**Direction:** One-way (import to Asset-Map)  
**What it does:** Professional data import from various sources (CSV, Excel, legacy systems)  
**Data Synced:** Client data, financial accounts, household structures  
**Setup Complexity:** Easy (professional services available)  
**Limitations:** May incur fees ($99/hour for extreme data sets)  
**Documentation:** Available through support

#### 7. Export Capabilities
**Type:** Standard export  
**Direction:** One-way (from Asset-Map)  
**What it does:** Export Asset-Map reports to PDF, Excel, and other formats  
**Data Synced:** Visual reports, financial summaries, household data  
**Setup Complexity:** Easy (built-in export functionality)  
**Limitations:** Standard export formats only  
**Documentation:** Available through platform

---

## Integration Types Available

- **Native integrations:** Redtail CRM, Morningstar Office
- **API:** Custom API for enterprise clients
- **Webhook:** Available for real-time notifications
- **Third-party:** Riskalyze, eMoney, and other planning tools
- **Import/Export:** Standard data import and export capabilities

- **Risk Assessment:** Riskalyze

- **Custodian Platforms:** Morningstar Office

## API & Developer Info

**API Availability:** Yes (Enterprise tier)

**Developer Portal:** Available through enterprise sales contact

**Authentication Methods:**
- API keys for custom integrations
- OAuth 2.0 for third-party apps
- SSO (SAML) for platform access

**Rate Limits:** Not publicly disclosed (contact for enterprise limits)

**API Documentation:** Available upon enterprise agreement

**Webhook Support:** Yes for real-time notifications

**API Cost:** Included in enterprise pricing (no separate API fees)

## Evaluation Notes

### Pros (5+ items)
1. **Visual Client Engagement** - Intuitive visual maps that clients understand easily
2. **Streamlined Discovery** - Reduces fact-finding time from hours to minutes
3. **Comprehensive Household View** - All financial elements in one visual representation
4. **Gap Identification** - Automated detection of missing information and opportunities
5. **Goal Tracking** - Interactive Target-Maps for client accountability
6. **Strong Integrations** - Native Redtail and Morningstar integrations
7. **30-Day Guarantee** - Risk-free trial with money-back guarantee
8. **Professional Services** - Data import assistance available

### Cons (4+ items)
1. **No Public Pricing** - Requires sales contact for quotes
2. **Learning Curve** - Visual mapping approach requires adaptation
3. **Limited to Visualization** - Not a full financial planning solution
4. **API Access Limited** - Full API only available in enterprise tier
5. **Import Fees** - Extreme data sets may incur $99/hour fees
6. **Dependency on Integrations** - Best results require integrated CRM/planning tools

### Alternatives
- **RightCapital:** Comprehensive financial planning with visualization
- **MoneyGuidePro:** Financial planning software with visual elements
- **Asset-Map Alternative:** Other visual planning tools
- **Tolerisk:** Risk assessment and visualization
- **Riskalyze:** Risk tolerance assessment platform

### Use Cases

**Ideal For:**
- Advisors wanting to enhance client engagement visually
- Practices seeking streamlined discovery process
- Firms using Redtail CRM (native integration)
- Advisors focusing on household-level planning
- Practices wanting to identify planning gaps systematically
- Firms needing client accountability tools (Target-Maps)

**Not Ideal For:**
- Advisors seeking full financial planning software (separate tool needed)
- Practices not wanting visual-based client communication
- Firms without integrated CRM (may require manual data entry)
- Advisors requiring standalone planning capabilities
- Very small practices with minimal client engagement needs

### Key Differentiators

1. **Visual-First Approach** - Unique visual mapping distinguishes from text-based tools
2. **Software-as-Process** - Designed around advisor workflows, not just data storage
3. **Signals Technology** - Automated financial preparedness indicators
4. **Target-Maps** - Interactive goal tracking for client accountability
5. **Gestalt Psychology Principles** - Based on design thinking for holistic understanding
6. **Strong Redtail Integration** - Native, bi-directional integration with Redtail CRM

## Research Methodology Notes

**Sources Accessed:**
- Official Asset-Map website (asset-map.com)
- Support documentation and integration guides
- G2 and Capterra review platforms
- Industry analysis from Kitces and WealthTech Club
- Financial Planning industry publications
- LinkedIn company profile

**Limitations Encountered:**
- Pricing is not publicly disclosed; requires sales contact
- API documentation requires enterprise agreement
- Specific integration details for some platforms not fully documented
- Feature set focused on visualization, not full planning

**Recommended Next Steps:**
1. Request enterprise pricing and API documentation from Asset-Map sales
2. Conduct 30-day trial to assess visual mapping capabilities
3. Evaluate integration with existing CRM (especially Redtail if applicable)
4. Review client engagement workflows and adoption potential
5. Assess ROI based on improved discovery efficiency and client engagement
